original_text:
Now they grope through the streets
    as if they were blind.
They are so defiled with blood
    that no one dares to touch their garments.
korean_text: 그들이 거리 거리에서 맹인 같이 방황함이여 그들의 옷들이 피에 더러워졌으므로 그들이 만질 수 없도다

sentences.original_text: Now they grope through the streets
They are so defiled with blood
that no one dares to touch their garments
